tapTapUp.title: Privacy Policy
tapTapUp.section1Text: TapTapUp is a simple game that does not collect any personal data from its players.
tapTapUp.section2Text: We do not collect names, email addresses, location data, or any other personal information.
tapTapUp.section3Text: Since we do not collect any data, there is no processing, storage, or sharing of user information.
tapTapUp.section4Text: There is no user data to secure. TapTapUp does not transmit or store any personal information.
tapTapUp.section5Text: If you have any questions about this policy, please reach out to us at:
tapTapUp.finalText: Thank you for playing TapTapUp. Enjoy the game!
